item.title: KV Cache is 1 Bit Per Channel: Efficient Large Language Model Inference with Coupled Quantization
item.description: Boost LLM inference speed 1.4-3.5x by using Coupled Quantization (CQ) to compress KV cache down to 1 bit per channel, while preserving model accuracy.
